news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Sage Geosystems will initiate a geothermal project at Fort Bliss for the U.S. Army and the Defense Innovation Unit, focusing on advancing energy resilience through geothermal solutions.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Sage Geosystems and INFRATICO operate in the energy and environmental technology sector. Sage Geosystems focuses on geothermal development, while INFRATICO is involved in research and development in physical, engineering, and life sciences.

org_similarity_list.target_short_description: Sage Geosystem is a transformative geothermal development company.
org_similarity_list.source_short_description: INFRATICO provides research and development in the physical, engineering, and life sciences.

research_insight_text_link.research_insight_description: Sage Geosystems is focused on advancing geothermal energy extraction and storage. Their R&D includes a subterranean energy storage system utilizing geothermal reservoirs and wellbores for fluid retention. They are developing a geopressure and geothermal power system with pressure exchangers and power generation units linked to production wells. Innovations also encompass a downhole heat exchanger and thermally insulated tubing to enhance geothermal power systems' efficiency. Additionally, they are researching methods to control fracture growth direction and rate during geothermal extraction, optimizing the use of fracking fluids. These efforts aim to improve the reliability and efficiency of geothermal energy systems.

overview_description.description: Sage Geosystem is a transformative geothermal development company working to optimize both the well(s) and power plant to make geothermal accessible and affordable everywhere.

about_short_description.short_description: Sage Geosystem is a transformative geothermal development company.

product.name: Geopressured Geothermal System (GGS)
product.description: A geothermal energy system that harnesses both heat and pressure to double energy output, making geothermal power more accessible and affordable.

product.name: GeoTwin
product.description: A proprietary geothermal modeling tool used to optimize well and power plant configurations for enhanced geothermal energy extraction.

product.name: HeatRoot
product.description: A proprietary technology for enhanced geothermal system design in hot dry rock, utilizing downward-oriented fracturing to improve heat extraction.

product.name: EarthStore
product.description: An energy storage solution that pairs with renewable energy sources to provide baseload electricity, leveraging geothermal technology for efficient storage.

product.name: Battery+
product.description: An advanced energy storage technology that increases the efficiency of geothermal power generation and storage, enabling reliable electricity supply.
